summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from October 1, 2013, to October 31, 2013. It details incoming and outgoing money transfers, service charges, and the ending balance for the account. The document highlights significant outgoing transactions to Southern Trust Company and First Bank, Puerto Rico.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Incoming Money Transfer
events.description: An incoming money transfer of $372,921.98 was credited to the account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: An outgoing money transfer of $125,000.00 to Aden Solutions, Inc. was made.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: Two outgoing money transfers totaling $175,000.00 to Southern Trust Company and First Bank, Puerto Rico were made.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $372,921.98 on October 1, 2013.
The account experienced significant outgoing transactions totaling $300,000.00 during October 2013.
Amanda Kirby is the contact person for account inquiries.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors on the account statement.
There are multiple references to Southern Trust Company in the context of outgoing transfers.
